EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=}}: Win 2 Tix to VMworld | Enter the VMTurbo VMworld Sweepstakes | 1 Chance Left
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Enter Today. Win on Friday. Go in August.
Enter to Win Tickets to VMworld®: http://bit.ly/1krN3vc
Win 2 Full Passes to VMworld® 2014 <http://bit.ly/1krN3vc> This is for real. If you don't believe us, ask our winners, Shaun Sparks <<http://bit.ly/1vvjDi7>> & Gary Solomon.
Next Friday, June 27th, VMTurbo is giving away its final two Full Conference Passes to VMworld® 2014 in San Francisco <http://longwhiteclouds.com/2014/06/13/want-a-free-ticket-to-vmworld-usa-find-out-how>. The epicenter of all things virtual, VMworld® is our industry's biggest stage. We will be there, and we want you there too. Tick tock. Enter to Win <http://bit.ly/1krN3vc> 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
